attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With regard to house inspectors. 
The government has no right to reject a petition on this matter as I found in the rejections file.
I have a right to protest.

rejection.details:
The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
Feedback should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
There are a few reasons the petition may be in the rejections file without knowing exactly which petition you are refering to it is impossible to say, but it may be that there is already another petition on the same issue, for example http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/revaluation/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
